Flicker/Phoenix::

The pair has finally managed to find some quiet time, alone in 
Flicker's quarters.  Seated on the bed, with his arm around her 
shoulders, they talk quietly.

"It's nice that you've gotten your memory back," Flicker tells her.

"Yeah.  We used to sit on the hill over the monastery, and watch the 
sunset.  That was where you kissed me for the first time."

Flicker nods.  The kiss in and of itself had been ill-advised, 
considering Phoenix had still been under her vows to the Sisterhood 
at the time.  But that was a long time ago, before tragedy had 
seperated them.  The pair were finally reunited not too long ago, but 
circumstance, duty, and Phoenix's battle with amnesia had conspired 
to keep them from each other.  No longer.

Phoenix nestles herself a little deeper into her love's embrace as 
they share a passionate kiss.  All her tormented past, her nightmares 
from captivity, melt away into simple joy.
